subject: Add headless option parsing tests (extract parseArgs)
description: Extract CLI arg parsing from packages/terminal/src/index.tsx into a testable helper (e.g., src/cli/args.ts). Add unit tests to cover all headless options: -p/--print required, --output-format (text/json/stream-json + invalid default), --allowed-tools trimming, --system-prompt, --json-schema, --continue, --resume (resume overrides continue), and --cwd + cwdProvided flag.
